title: How do i sim card unlock my Google Pixel 3a? Target gave Verizon version and now I'm abroad.
content:
Tried buying unlocked Google Pixel 3a from Target but they gave me Verizon version. Didn't realize as I was using a prepaid Verizon Sim in USA.  Went back to Peru and now it says only works with Verizon Sim cards - Peru doesn't have Verizon.

Verizon said they aren't going to unlock it so is there anything Google can do to help turn my $400 dollar paperweight back into a cellphone?
